desc: Specialist online store for New, Rare, Vintage, Secondhand, Pre-Owned, Collectable, Promo & Used Vinyl Records, CDs, LP Albums, 7", 12" Singles, CD singles & Music Memorabilia from RareVinyl.com. Over 250,000 items in stock including Limited Editions & Record Store Day. Shipping Worldwide Daily - We both buy and sell.

layout.text: Serving Record Collectors Worldwide since 1985, we are the leader in buying and selling rare, vintage, new, used, pre owned & second hand vinyl records, singles, LPs, CDs & music memorabilia. We have over 250,000 items in stock available for you to order today. You may already know us as eil.com.
